headline: Can Humana Walking Club Partnership Help SPG Strengthen Its Appeal Among Key Demographics?
summary: Humana recently announced a partnership with Simon Property Group to launch the Humana Walking Club wellness program at 21 Simon mall centers nationwide, offering complimentary monthly organized walks and health-focused activities for community members, especially older adults, before mall opening hours. This collaboration leverages Simon's omnichannel marketing assets and foot traffic to generate actionable consumer insights and new opportunities for targeted retailer engagement within its...
